description: The story is a playful take on detective work, featuring an alligator detective and his human partner.
title: The In-vest-igator
n_1: Garry the Gator sits in a detective office, dressed in a vest, looking serious.
n_2: Detective Reed enters, surprised by his unusual partner.
n_3: Garry points out a crucial clue, gaining Reed's respect.
n_4: They share a laugh over the joke of Garry being an 'in-vest-igator'.
c1_1: I think I've cracked the case!
c2_1: An alligator as a detective? This I've got to see!
c1_3: It's all in the details, my dear Reed.
c1_4: Just doing my part in this 'in-vest-igation'!
